Text: Ooops.  Typo on the title.  Yes, this *is* the 1963 version.

Thanks for the up.  Every time I try to find this online, I get that abortion of a remake from 99.  This is, IMHO, the best (and most intelligent) "haunted house" movie ever put to film.  A pity to have it's memory tainted by DeBont.
